2.0.1.name: wordpress/kill-preview-2
2.0.1.description:
Support and development is stopped! The functionality given by this plugin is built into WP versions from 2.2 anyway...

The plugin removes the preview iframe and adds a preview link instead: The preview iframe in the post/page writing screen will be removed to load this page faster. Additionally there will be a link to the preview in the upper right corner of the screen, which opens a new window to the preview of the edited post/page. The plugin is based on the Kill Preview plugin by Owen Winkler, that did not work with WordPress 2.1. This version does ;)
